title: I have an honest question for you Riot.
body:
So I guess I just want to know why of all the champions you thought needed a new skin you chose teemo? I mean there are tons of other champions who have had little to no skins since release or have been left alone with no skins in a very long time. (Zac, Jayce, kennen, Nocturne. and many more) so why not do something for them instead of the bastard rat I mean I do understand he has not had a skin in a while either but I mean it just seems like there were so many better candidates for one. Oh well I look forward to seeing how this turns out.  

Edit: Got my first riot response ever :3 thanks agaIn for stopping by to clarify things KateyChaos, also saw the new skins up on pbe  and oh my goodness finally  new rammus, vayne, and xerath skins also happy skarner is getting skin love lately ^_^

replies.body:
Hey Tyrantking7,

You're right in that there are several champions who are in need of their next skin, and we're making our way to them! We can't release everything at once, but I can assure you, there's a lot more to come this year! 

In regards to why another skin, his last skin was actually in 2012, which means it's been quite some time since the previous skin. Naturally, champions who have been around the longest e.g. Ashe, Annie or Warwick, will have more skins than newer champions. 

Hope this clears things up a bit!
Ok :) thanks for the reply, cant wait to see how it turns out :P

Sigh, So it will have to all be done over again in a year or so... Sigh...

During the last few panels regarding champion design Teemo has been brought up multiple times and everytime they have stated that he will be getting a rework. So may I ask why (again) are you making a particle heavy skin when it will have to have all new particles and animations done when his rework comes around in the nearish future.
what if there is also a rework in the next cycle? :p

I don't think teemo is in need of a real rework in his current state like maybe he could use a TU but honestly there are still champions like mordekaiser who has dish pans for feet in need of reworks like you are gonna be waiting a while on that one is my guess.

Not visual but Gameplay. They have even stated it multiple times. If you all want I can go back and directly quote them but to paraphrase. He has little in the therms of meaningful counterplay, he has little actual interaction that can be acted upon by his opponent, His kit causes frustration to both his opponent (cant do anything if he is winning) or frustration to his team (he loses and becomes a hindrance).

Teemo is like many of the FAVORED few (Lee, Nid, Zed, Ori) who only receive love taps at best when they become a problem or their reworks don't even remotely solve the issues Riot states are the issues with the champion. Their actual reworks are put off repeatedly until people forget about them entirely or the champion becomes a menace once again. 

I know a lot of my down votes are because HAIL SATAN Teemo lovers but realistically he nor the game has changed to make his kit healthier for the game.

Yeah he is still in need of some gameplay reworking  but again I doubt anything will come of it anytime soon as there are still heavy duty reworks (like Cho'gaths full model teardown VU and possible kit changes) taking up time for the respective teams working them. If anything does happen it will be minor nerfs to him to placate people till they find the time to work on it.
Yorick. No skin since 2011.
They will remember Yorick mori!
I agree with you.  But I know one of the issues is this, some champions are just easier and more fun to make skins for.

Yeah I understand that like the fact that zac has just such a weird model that its hard to make a skin for him that is not just a recolor but my issue is just that teemo has had balls loads of skins for himself already xD I understand why they might do it since his last one was astronaut back in 2013 I think it was still others could use attention XD.
I 100% agree with you.
still this skin is sure to be interesting my hope is that if they make it a line of skins some of these less noticed champs get skins again finally
inb4 riot doesn't respond
xD I would be suprised if they did but it was worth asking.

> [{quoted}](name=Tyrantking7,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=mdJW9xyF,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-03-24T20:44:54.709+0000)
>
> xD I would be suprised if they did but it was worth asking.

Lol I know the feeling
pretty sure everyone does XD
Ok now we need this, riot this is cool !!!
Cottontail Teemo accounted for 11.2% of Riot's 2014 revenues. It makes sense to fill the demand.
I guess xD

To be fair, let's look at it another way:

1.) After Astronaut Teemo was demoted to 1350, he no longer had a legendary skin.
2.) Despite being the bane of player's existence, Teemo has NO SERIOUS SKIN to deliver on that.  They're all cutesy.
3.) Skins are being worked on for many champions at once.  Just because it isn't being released right now doesn't mean it won't be.
4.) The skin theme is actually kinda chilling.  This is a Teemo who's gone completely off the edge and has murdered / watched everyone he knew die.  It's a dark skin for a champion who's backstory flat-out says he's an unrepentant assassin.

I'd be perfectly comfortable with this being Teemo's final skin.  He does have a lot of skins.  But this one fulfills an area that none of his other skins have delivered on: dark, gritty, creepy.  Basically the Satan Teemo skin that we've attributed to the rat for so long.
yeah like I said I understand why they are doing it and I may enjoy the skin all thins considered but im hoping more skins are in work for  less noticed champs

TEETO NEED MOAR SKINS TEETO IS THE RULER OF THE WORLD

oh good xD

Nocturne actually has few  skins, jayce got that gentleman skin with the white costume fairly recently.
I agree with zac, there is an amazing pool party skin i keep seeing on facebook for zac, where he is made of water and i wanna see that.

Zed needs a cool skin too since he is such a famous champion.

Azir, gnar, kalista, reksai, are the new champs that need one more skin each.

Generally i think you are right the skin world isn't very well balanced

well Jayce got the debonair actually a couple seasons back (if I remember right it was like middle to end of season 3) and that was his last skin he had so he's sitting on 2 skins only atm, and nocturne's last one was eternum which was released ages ago xD although he has a decent amount my point with those 2 and kennen was more of the fact that champs like them had not recieved skins in a decently long amount of time. xD riot needs work it out but im hoping this is actually a skin line and a few of the older champs will get encompassed in it.
Right? teemo has 10 skins already...
